title:
oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - 446°F Heat Resistant,Turner Tongs,Spatula,Spoon,Brush,Whisk,Wooden Handles Pink Kitchen Gadgets Tools Set for Nonstick Cookware;
BPA Free, heat-resistant, non-melting, wooden handle, easy to clean
descriptions:
Introducing the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - the perfect companion for your nonstick cookware! 

Made with food grade silicone, these utensils are BPA free and heat resistant up to 446°F, ensuring safe and healthy cooking. The wooden handles provide a comfortable grip and prevent heat transfer, making them perfect for all your culinary adventures. 

Cleaning up is a breeze with these utensils! They are easy to clean, but please note that they are not dishwasher safe. 

This incredible set includes 14 essential kitchen tools: Deep Soup Ladle, Solid Serving Spoon, Slotted Spoon, Slotted Turner, Turner, Food Tongs, Pasta Server, Flexible Spatula, Basting Brush, Whisk, Round Spatula Turner, Large Skimmer Spoon, Small Silicone Spatula, and an Utensil Holder to keep everything organized. 

The one-piece design and stainless steel core ensure durability and longevity, while the no-gap molding makes them hygienic and easy to clean. Plus, these utensils are non-reactive with food, so you can cook with confidence. 

We also provide initial use instructions to ensure the best performance from your utensils. Simply soak them for half an hour and let them air for about 3 hours to remove any original smell of the silica gel. 

Rest assured that your satisfaction is our top priority. Our after-sales team is ready to assist you within 12 hours of your inquiry. 

Upgrade your kitchen with the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set today!
